backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing marketplace backend with user management (profiles, artist status), item CRUD operations, brand configuration, Stripe integration per artist, featured items, access control, and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state (single stripeConfig, userProfiles) to new structure (per-user stripeConfigs, users with isArtist flag and profiles).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: Settings navigation link, Settings page with artist/Stripe config, CreateItemForm artist check, Stripe config moved to Settings, and React Query hooks for artist status.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components (Header, forms, admin dashboard), pages (home, browse, settings, admin), hooks (useQueries with all backend operations), and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color system, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, cards, and charts.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx, titled 'Artist Marketplace'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component using TanStack Router with routes for home, browse, item detail, create/edit item, settings, admin, and payment pages; includes Header, Footer, and ProfileSetupModal in root layout.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied error screen component displaying shield icon, message, and button to return home for unauthorized page access attempts.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Tabbed admin dashboard component with forms for updating platform branding (name, logo, color) and configuration (fee percentage) using brand config queries and mutations.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: A filter component that displays category buttons (All, Music, Video, Images, 3D Prints, Ceramics, Paintings) and allows users to select a category to filter items.
frontend/src/components/CreateItemForm.t: A form component for creating new marketplace items with fields for title, description, price, category, and images, including AI-powered description generation and artist status verification.
frontend/src/components/EditItemForm.tsx: A form component for editing existing marketplace items, allowing updates to title, description, price, and category with AI-powered description generation support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A footer component displaying About, Connect (social links), and Legal sections, plus a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A sticky header component with navigation links (Browse, List Item, Settings, Admin), authentication button, and mobile menu support, displaying platform branding from brand config.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: A hero banner component with background image, platform name, tagline, and call-to-action buttons for exploring the marketplace and listing items.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: An image carousel component with navigation arrows and thumbnail strip for displaying multiple item images, falling back to a placeholder if no images exist.
frontend/src/components/ItemGrid.tsx: A responsive grid component that displays marketplace items as cards with image, title, description, category badge, creator name, and price.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile setup, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseButton.t: React component that renders a purchase button for an item, creates a Stripe checkout session via mutation hook, and redirects to the Stripe payment URL.
frontend/src/components/StripePaymentSet: Admin configuration form for setting up Stripe payment processing with secret key and allowed countries, showing configuration status and allowing updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, artist status, items CRUD, brand config, Stripe configuration, and checkout session creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm artisan color palette for light and dark modes, defining CSS variables for UI theming and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only page displaying Stripe payment setup and admin dashboard, with access control checking if caller is admin.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Marketplace browsing page with category filtering that displays items in a grid, fetching all items or filtered by selected category.
frontend/src/pages/CreateItemPage.tsx: Page for creating new marketplace items, requiring authentication and rendering the CreateItemForm component.
frontend/src/pages/EditItemPage.tsx: Page for editing existing items with access control checking if user is the creator or admin, rendering EditItemForm for the specified item ID.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the hero section and a grid of the first 8 featured items from the marketplace, with loading state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed item information including image gallery, description, price, creator profile, and purchase/edit/delete actions based on user permissions (creator or admin).
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a cancellation message when payment fails, with links to browse marketplace or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a success confirmation after completed payment, with options to continue shopping or return home.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: User settings page displaying profile information, artist mode toggle, and Stripe payment setup for artists; requires authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, container settings, font families (Inter/Playfair Display), and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining an artist marketplace platform with Stripe integration, 10% platform fee, multi-photo uploads, and a known issue where item posting fails with 'user not found' error.
